医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
健康饮食和有组织的运动与儿童更好的推理能力有关推理技能是学习、学业表现和解决日常问题的关键技能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Healthy-diet-and-organized-sports-linked-to-better-reasoning-skills-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Healthy-diet-and-organized-sports-linked-to-better-reasoning-skills-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69632d1e-520a-47c6-b8f4-db1958409d9e Thu, 17 Aug 2023 16:05:26 -0400 Healthy diet and organized sports linked to better reasoning skills in children
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：堕胎药的法律困境仍在继续由三名法官组成的联邦上诉法院小组意见分歧，裁定下级法院试图完全推翻 FDA 对堕胎药物米非司酮的批准是错误的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Abortion-pille28099s-legal-limbo-continues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-Abortion-pille28099s-legal-limbo-continues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af9c24cb-d9c2-4554-90dc-ed6c7b9e7a4e Thu, 17 Aug 2023 15:37:52 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Abortion pill’s legal limbo continues
基于深度学习的人工智能模型可以根据健康个体的胸片来估计年龄如果“看起来像你的年龄”不是指你的脸而是你的胸部怎么办？大阪都立大学的科学家开发了一种先进的人工智能 (AI) 模型，利用胸部 X 光片来准确估计患者的实际年龄。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Deep-learning-based-AI-model-can-estimate-age-from-chest-radiographs-of-healthy-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Deep-learning-based-AI-model-can-estimate-age-from-chest-radiographs-of-healthy-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f45e96fa-1d47-4856-97a9-47217b87921b Thu, 17 Aug 2023 15:34:05 -0400 Deep learning-based AI model can estimate age from chest radiographs of healthy individuals
关于肝祖细胞在肝癌发生中作用的新见解原发性肝癌是2020年第六大最常见癌症和第三大癌症相关死亡原因。在所有原发性肝癌中，HCC是最常见的癌症，占5年以上病例的80%以上西方国家存活率不足10%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/New-insights-into-the-role-of-liver-progenitor-cells-in-liver-cancer-initiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/New-insights-into-the-role-of-liver-progenitor-cells-in-liver-cancer-initiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2265b06d-d1f2-4d8a-ab7b-4df0e3ffa41f Thu, 17 Aug 2023 15:29:53 -0400 New insights into the role of liver progenitor cells in liver cancer initiation
左炔诺孕酮-吡罗昔康联合治疗有望成为更有效的紧急避孕药根据《柳叶刀》发表的一项随机对照试验，与单独服用左炔诺孕酮相比，在无保护性行为后同时服用吡罗昔康（一种常用于治疗关节炎疼痛的抗炎药物）和左炔诺孕酮紧急避孕药可显着提高怀孕率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Levonorgestrel-piroxicam-co-treatment-shows-promise-as-more- effective-emergency-contraception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Levonorgestrel-piroxicam-co-treatment-shows-promise-as-more- effective-emergency-contraception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea881e32-a915-44ee-9209-82f868d76937 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 15:22:20 -0400 Levonorgestrel-piroxicam co-treatment shows promise as more effective emergency contraception
研究调查快速基因组测序对婴儿癫痫的影响婴儿癫痫的严重程度各不相同，可能会让护理人员对孩子的健康产生疑问。虽然基因检测可以帮助确定癫痫的病因，但全面的检测并不总是常规进行，而且可能需要很长时间，让家人等待答案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-investigates-the-impact-of-rapid-genome-sequencing-for-infantile-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Study-investigates-the-impact-of-rapid-genome-sequencing-for-infantile-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9284d792-b49f-4cc7-b3f4-74c7cb10736c Thu, 17 Aug 2023 15:17:10 -0400 Study investigates the impact of rapid genome sequencing for infantile epilepsy
研究人员获得国防部拨款以针对胰腺癌的化疗耐药性迈阿密大学米勒医学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心的研究人员获得了美国国防部 (DoD) 国会指导医学研究计划的拨款，以针对胰腺癌的化疗耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Researchers-receive-DoD-grant-to-target-chemotherapy-resistance-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Researchers-receive-DoD-grant-to-target-chemotherapy-resistance-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15b61af6-c932-4bb7-9795-0006f0a0e348 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 15:11:46 -0400 Researchers receive DoD grant to target chemotherapy resistance in pancreatic cancer
消遣性药物的使用可能会使心脏重症监护患者的预后恶化《心脏》杂志在线发表的一项法国多中心研究结果表明，消遣性药物的使用可能是导致心脏重症监护室入院的很大一部分原因，在此类患者中，十分之一的患者中检测到了各种物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Recreational-drug-use-may-worsen-outcomes-for-cardiac-intense-care-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Recreational-drug-use-may-worsen-outcomes-for-cardiac-intense-care-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78c8e4e4-af2c-4af8-91b1-762b2a598b5e Thu, 17 Aug 2023 15:04:24 -0400 Recreational drug use may worsen outcomes for cardiac intensive care patients
智能手机应用程序帮助大学生减少饮酒今天发表在《英国医学杂志》上的一项研究表明，使用智能手机酒精干预应用程序可以帮助大学生减少总体饮酒量和酗酒天数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Smartphone-app-helps-university-students-cut-down-on-alcohol.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/Smartphone-app-helps-university-students-cut-down-on-alcohol.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9fc70b6-0744-4285-b7bd-92040f6001f9 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 14:58:21 -0400 Smartphone app helps university students cut down on alcohol
CPD 兽医网络研讨会强调动物和人类健康合作，改善诊断和治疗的使用英国北安普顿（2023 年 8 月 15 日）——HORIBA UK 将举办一场 CPD 网络研讨会，重点讨论 One Health 多学科方法如何为兽医诊断和治疗的使用带来有益的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/CPD-vet-webinar-to-highlight-animal-and- human-health-collaborations-improving-diagnostics-and-therapeutics-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230817/CPD-vet-webinar-to-highlight-animal-and- human-health-collaborations-improving-diagnostics-and-therapeutics-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c0e7cc7-68b2-4ec8-b433-1b698b2b6632 Thu, 17 Aug 2023 10:03:00 -0400 CPD vet webinar to highlight animal and human health collaborations improving diagnostics and therapeutics use
